entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Review usages of impGetNodeAddr with ignored flags #89372
    Future
  • MonoAOT producing invalid ARM assembly for generic specialization heavy code #89369
  • [Docs] Image not loading due to asset deletion #89367
  • `JsonIgnoreAttribute` isn't honored in SourceGenerationMode #89365
  • [API Proposal]: Support for copying Measurement<T> with same tags but different value #89363
  • `__icall_wrapper_ves_icall_mono_delegate_ctor` can lead to SIGSEGV on iOS with `MtouchInterpreter=-all` #89359

Closed

  • Intrinsify Encoding.TryGetBytes for UTF16 -> UTF8 literals #84659
    8.0.0
  • Empty .pfx certificates causes apps to crash after a while #89345
    8.0.0
  • Services resolving incorrectly in Development environment but not Production #65145
    8.0.0
  • PeriodicTimer.WaitForNextTickAsync lack <exception> comment #89366
  • Rejit test failures in outerloop - unexpected counts #87300
    8.0.0
  • Unsafe.As resulting in lots of unnecessary moves. #55357
    8.0.0
  • Native AOT - interop - statically linking / calling .lib while producing single EXE #89361

PullRequests

Created

  • Added 'DOTNET_JitDisasmTesting' knob. #89373
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Dynamic events #89371
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Inconsistent DebuggerDisplay formatting - Task 1 Fix space, equal for name/value. #89370
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Update Workflow instruction for codespace #89368
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • handle QUIC_STATUS_ADDRESS_NOT_AVAILABLE #89362
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT fixes, and rationalization to allow improved testing #89360
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • JIT: Intrinsify UTF16->UTF8 conversion for string literals (Encoding.UTF8.TryGetBytes) #85328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Properly close malformed PKCS12 files when enumerating stores #89355
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Fix potential BitCast bug for platforms without unaligned reads #89364
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, community-contribution
  • Fix EventPipe utf8 conversion methods to match between JIT and AOT #89353
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write/Copy, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Unify hardware feature detection between CoreCLR JIT and AOT #89342
    area-PAL-coreclr

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] A few scalability fixes for the fat Lock #88633
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Replace GVMLookupForSlot internal cache with generic cache similar to CastCache #89331
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2227885 #89321
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Mono] [RISCV] Fix abi issues (Monthly pr) #88649
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • preserve TargetHostName even if we do not send it out via SNI #89289
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • add SendTo/ReceiveFrom with SocketAddress #88970
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix TraceSwitch to synchronize the Value and Level properties #89278
    area-System.Diagnostics.TraceSource, 8.0.0
  • Enable configuration FunctionalTests.ArrayTests.DifferentConfigSources_Merged_* tests on ios/tvos #89319
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Add SearchValues<string> #88394
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Have callee/callerSaveRegs() use an array based lookup #89351
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow multiple kmask registers to be allocated and cleanup some codegen around them #89059
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Is this all I need to do? #89316
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SBLK_MASK_LOCK_THREADID allow tid up to 65535 (#88772) #89335
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Remove --flat from default dsymutil options #89358
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete NativeAOT_StaticInitialization #89291
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-23
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: consider using the LLVM nuw and nsw operations for add #2256

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add more inbounds cases #2355
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add "noalis" to allocator helpers #2354
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement more efficient null-checking and use inbounds GEPs #2348
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-23
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • File used by another process #33956
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • Native AOT doesn't work with Windows Forms #34129
  • Cannot Run any commands that build a windows forms project. #33736
  • 'Dotnet tool restore' does not work correctly when NUGET_PACKAGES (global-packages) is set to an alternative location #11432
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Updated

  • Containers: handle Basic auth, registries with non-Uri Realms, and registries that do not provide Service information #33753
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Simplifier.ReduceAsync method does not return, waits forever #69178
  • "Implement through" isn't available for primary constructor parameters #69177
    Backlog
  • Severity configuration is confusing #69176

Closed

  • CS0052: Compilation error when trying to compile class with internal protected member which has internal type #69175
  • Primary constructor properties have sequence points but breakpoints can't be placed #63299
    17.8 P1

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unnecessary calls to `Contains` for sets #69179
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Updated

  • Small simplifications in helper functions. #69171
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection literals: collection builder methods #68930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols in C# #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Analyze primary constructor parameter captures #69174
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce array allocations in `PENamedTypeSymbol.TypeParameters` and `PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers` #68978
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Fix Color Color const field initialization accessing the Color type #68283
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Cache extension methods on binder #69172
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui Hybrid App stuck on "Loading..." in release mode on Android. #16313
  • Having problems with maui. #16312
  • My shadows are not rendering correctly on Samsung S21 [API 33] #16311

Closed

  • android #16306

PullRequests

Updated

  • Added Device ID to Essentials.DeviceInfo #16290
    community ✨
  • Fix infinite recursion error in CommandMapper.Add() #16264
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16300
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add ViewHandler Mapper docs #16296
    area/docs 📓
  • Adds a null check to avoid crashing SearchHandler #16308

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-23
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Question: reduce memory usage as much as possible #31337
  • The milliseconds of `DateTime` are lost when adding data seeds in database migration. #31334
  • System.Net.Internals.SocketExceptionFactory.ExtendedSocketException: 'A non-blocking socket operation could not be completed immediately #31280

PullRequests

Merged

  • Removed "MySQL" duplication from README.md #31336

Updated

  • Add DateOnly.ToString / TimeOnly.ToString query mapping for SQL Server #31289
